songs.title: Can We Pretend (Hook N Sling Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I remember conversations
We were dancing up on tables
Taking pictures when we had nowhere to post
You were laughin', I was cryin'
We were dancin'‚ we were dyin'
Sometimes I don't know how we walked away

[Pre-Chorus 1]
If I'm honest what I liked
Were the things we didn't know
Every morning‚ every night
I'd be beating down your door
Just to tell you what I'm thinking
But you already know
Screw this‚ I don't wanna let it go

[Chorus]
So can we pretend?
So can we pretend?
Can we?
So can we pretend?
(Push it)
Stop
So can we pretend?
Oh
So can we pretend?
So can we pretend?
Can we?
So can we pretend?
(Push it)
Stop

[Post-Chorus]
(Push it, push it, push it‚ push it, push it)

[Verse 1]
I remember conversations
We were dancing up on tables
Taking pictures when we had nowhere to post
You were laughin', I was cryin'
We were dancin'‚ we were dyin'
Sometimes I don't know how we walked away

[Pre-Chorus 1]
If I'm honest what I liked
Were the things we didn't know
Every morning, every night
I'd be beating down your door
Just to tell you what I'm thinking
But you already know
Screw this, I don't wanna let it go

[Chorus]
So can we pretend? Oh
So can we pretend?
So can we pretend?
Can we?
So can we pretend?
(Push it)
Stop
Oh
Oh
Can we?
